title: Can I point out a slight change to Jhin to make it have more sense
body: Just a small change really. But, when you land the snare from Jhin's W ability and since it is a QUITE long skillshot, shouldn't you gain like 2x movement speed from his passive. It would make more sense since why would you need the movement speed at all if you're not close enough to make the snare useful in any way

replies.body:
The snare is there for the engage and disengage.

If you're not close enough to AA, you can snare for the rest of your team, and your ult, to hit.

If you are close enough to AA, you can attack or re-position.
the move speed is for helping escape with an aa w
Your team can tho. It's already heaps good in that it snares off ally damage instead of just your own.
